tool_description: This API allows you to retrieve information about a specific video on Snapchat & Spotlight Online. You can use it to retrieve details such as the video title, description, thumbnail, video, gif. With the Snapchat Downloader API, you can easily access and leverage the wealth of information available on Snapchat.   telegram DM: https://t.me/justmobicode
name: Download Snapchat Video & Spotlight Online
title: Download Snapchat Video & Spotlight Online

api_list.name: Download Snap Video
api_list.description: This API endpoint allows users to download Snapchat videos  & Spotlight Online by providing the video URL as input.
